instructions: Character sheet for Triple Ace Game's *Leagues of Adventure*.This sheet is a translated and slightly modified version of Carl Tsui's (@ctsui) Hollow Earth expedition sheetThanks to Triple Ace Games for providing the official LoA logo for this sheet.### UsageFill in the text inputs with scores and play!Hover over text inputs for some hints. Auto-calc fields are kept to a minimal since Talents can change how scores are derived.### Wound Tracker* Click on a pip to cycle between lethal (pistol), non-lethal (fist), and healthy (empty).* Mark damage such that the bottom-most filled pip indicates your current health.<u>Example</u>:  Commander Dobson with Health 4 gets slugged for 2 points of non-lethal damage. Toggle the pip next to 3 and 2 to each show a fist. His current health is now 2.### Modifier PromptsThe sheet will present a dialog to ask for roll modifiers for every roll if modifier prompts are turned on. This may be convenient for players, but GMs may wish to leave this off.
